TopicTitle: How i make a custom planet?

Articles.Content: How do i make a custom planet?
Im pretty sure this would fit into "add-on discussions".. or better get to read the "kopernicus How-To".
Is Kopernicus the only option? or is there a modless way of doing it?

1 hour ago, steuben said:

Is Kopernicus the only option? or is there a modless way of doing it?

Sure... But you'd just be making your own mod then. Why make it harder on yourself?

If you want to mod the game, there is no modless way of doing it.

Kopernicus will make it easiest.

You need to make 3 things: A colormap, a heightmap, and a normal map... I think you can use kittopia exporter to generate the normals from the heightmap, and a different color map for the scaledspace view if you want (usefull if you have oceans).

You can optionally make a biome map as well.

Then you need to make the .cfg file for the planet... its easiest to use a "template" and just change specific parameters... ie orbit parameters, size, surface gravity, atmosphere.
